data.name: Super Robot Wars 30 - Bonus Mission Pack
data.detailed_description:
• Bonus Mission Pack
*Unlocks 15 Side Missions separate from the main storyline. Clearing them rewards extremely valuable Power Parts.

• Bonus Mission Pack Special Mission
*Rewards 100,000 credits, 1,000 PP, 5,000 MxP, and the SP Getter Power Part.

*This content is also included in the Digital Deluxe Edition, which includes the full game, Season Pass, and Bonus Mission Pack, and the Digital Ultimate Edition, which includes the full game, Season Pass, Bonus Mission Pack, and Premium Sound and Data Pack. Please be careful not to make duplicate purchases.

data.short_description: This pack unlocks 15 Side Missions separate from the main storyline. Clearing them rewards extremely valuable Power Parts.
data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6750 | AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 320, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 6670, 1 GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9400 | AMD Phenom II X3 720
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 9800 GTX, 512 MB | AMD Radeon HD 4870, 512 MB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
